revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFSR41 |revision=v3.1 |asin=B00004SB92 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=router |est_release_date=06/2003 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id=3762-22140004 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Micrel |cpu1_model=KS8695X |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BBC-90 |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16100-7T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header |serial=yes,, 20-pin header |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:12:17 }} {{TagLine|EtherFast Cable/DSL Router with 4-Port Switch}} A date code of '''0442''' (October 2004) is found on the board pictured below. :"3762-22140004" - Looks to be ''[[CyberTAN]]'' manufactured. *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/linksys-befsr41-etherfast-cabledsl-router-with-1 ''Linksys BEFSR41'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] {{See also|Linksys BEFSR41|Linksys}} ===Teardown=== *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Linksys+BEFSR41+Teardown/2957 ''Linksys BEFSR41'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=21091 ''Linksys BEFSR41'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :[[Linksys BEFSR41 v3.1]] • Broadband Router :CPU: [[Kendin]] KS8695 @166MHz (w/ MMU) :Flash: [[AMD]] AM29LV800B (1MB NAND) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM636165T (2MB SDRAM) :Dimensions: 185 × 155 × 48 mm (W×D×H) ===See also=== *[[Linksys BEFSR11]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41 v3.1]] • [[Micrel]] KS8695X (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41C-JP]] • [[Micrel]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41W]] • [[Linksys BEFSR41W-RN]] • [[Brecis]] *[[Linksys BEFVP41]] • [[Samsung]] S3C1510B (ARM7) *[[Linksys BEFSR81]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys WFR11B-JP]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 @166MHz ==Images== File:Linksys BEFSR41.JPG|Main board [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- ---- ---- ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
